org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades

Class IsolationBlade

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.IsolationBlade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Blade
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Printer

    public class IsolationBlade
extends BladeBase
    An isolation blade processes requests from other blades one at a time, starting a new request only when a result is returned for the previous one.

    This is just a convenience class, as any blade which uses an isolation reactor is an isolation blade.
